content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 243.5 - CSAPR NO[x] Ozone Season Group 2 New Unit Set-Aside allocations

State Regulations
(a) For each control period, the department
will determine distributions of CSAPR NO
x

Ozone Season

Group 2 allowances to any CSAPR NO
x

Ozone Season Group 2
unit in New York State that did not receive an allocation for the control
period pursuant to section
243.3
(b)(2)
of
this part (including an allocation of zero allowances), in accordance with the
following procedures: (1)

The department will
establish a CSAPR NO
x

Ozone Season Group 2 new unit
set-aside allocation for each control period not to exceed five percent of the
CSAPR NO
x

Ozone Season Group 2 Budget set forth in
section
243.3
of this part. (2)

Only CSAPR NO
x

Ozone Season Group 2 units may receive CSAPR NO
x

Ozone

Season Group 2 allowances from the CSAPR NO
x

Ozone

Season Group 2 new unit set-aside allocations established in paragraph (1) of
this subdivision. (3)
CSAPR
NO
x

Ozone Season Group 2 new unit set-aside allowances
may be transferred to CSAPR NO
x

Ozone Season Group 2
units for no more than eight consecutive control periods, starting with the
latter of the 2021 control period or the control period during which the CSAPR
NO
x

Ozone Season Group 2 unit commenced, or is projected
to commence, operation and ending with the control period preceding the first
control period for which the CSAPR NO
x

Ozone Season

Group 2 unit will receive an allocation pursuant to paragraph 243.3(b)(2) of
this part. (4)

The designated
representative of a CSAPR NO
x

Ozone Season Group 2 unit
must submit a written request to the department to reserve for the CSAPR
NO
x

Ozone Season Group 2 unit a number of CSAPR
NO
x

Ozone Season Group 2 allowances in the relevant
CSAPR NO
x

Ozone Season Group 2 new unit set-aside
account in an amount no greater than the number representing the unit's
potential to emit. The reservation request must be submitted prior to January
1st of the control period to which the reservation request pertains. The
department will not consider any request for the reservation of CSAPR
NO
x

Ozone Season Group 2 new unit set-aside allowances
submitted prior to the issuance of all permits and authorizations by the
department that are necessary for operation of the CSAPR NO
x

Ozone Season Group 2 unit. The reservation request must include
information detailing the potential to emit of the CSAPR
NO
x

Ozone Season Group 2 unit. (5)

Subject to the number of CSAPR
NO
x

Ozone Season Group 2 allowances allocated to each
new unit set-aside account, following department approval of the request for
reservation of CSAPR NO
x

Ozone Season Group 2
allowances, the department will reserve CSAPR NO
x

Ozone

Season Group 2 allowances in the CSAPR NO
x

Ozone Season

Group 2 new unit set-aside account before the start of the control period for
which the CSAPR NO
x

Ozone Season Group 2 unit will
receive an allocation pursuant to subdivision (a) of this section in an amount
no greater than the CSAPR NO
x

Ozone Season Group 2
unit's potential to emit. (6)

If
more than one CSAPR NO
x

Ozone Season Group 2 unit
requests the reservation of CSAPR NO
x

Ozone Season Group
2 allowances and the number of requested allowances exceeds the allocation to
the relevant CSAPR NO
x

Ozone Season Group 2 new unit
set-aside account, the department will reserve CSAPR NO
x

Ozone Season Group 2 allowances from the account for the units in the order in
which the CSAPR NO
x

Ozone Season Group 2 units submitted
approvable reservation requests. For the purposes of this paragraph, requests
will be considered simultaneous if they are made in the same calendar quarter. Should approvable reservation requests in excess of the allocation to the
relevant CSAPR NO
x

Ozone Season Group 2 new unit
set-aside account be submitted in the same calendar quarter by different CSAPR
NO
x

Ozone Season Group 2 units, the department will
reserve CSAPR NO
x

Ozone Season Group 2 allowances for
those units on a basis proportional to the number of CSAPR
NO
x

Ozone Season Group 2 allowances requested by each
CSAPR NO
x

Ozone Season Group 2 unit. (7)

By July 1st of each year, the department
will submit a request to the Administrator, in a format prescribed by the

Administrator, to transfer reserved CSAPR NO
x

Ozone

Season Group 2 allowances to the compliance account of the CSAPR
NO
x

Ozone Season Group 2 source that includes the
relevant CSAPR NO
x

Ozone Season Group 2 unit in an
amount no greater than the number representing the unit's potential to
emit. (8)

After the Administrator
makes the deductions for compliance under
40 CFR
97.824
(see Table 1, section
200.9
of this title) for a control
period, the department will determine whether any CSAPR NO
x

Ozone Season Group 2 allowances remain in the CSAPR
NO
x

Ozone Season Group 2 new unit set-aside account for
the control period. By July 1st following the control period, the department
will transfer any remaining CSAPR NO
x

Ozone Season Group
2 allowances from the CSAPR NO
x

Ozone Season Group 2 new
unit set-aside account to the EERET account. Allowances transferred to the
EERET account will be available for sale or other disposition in accordance
with section
243.6
of this part. Notes
